about_the_game:
LOVE BEYOND IMAGINATION

OTHER: Her Loving Embrace is an action RPG that fuses turn-based battles with stylish platformer combat. Descend into a vivid world of fantasy, brought to life through pixel-perfect visuals and an electrifying FM soundtrack. Discover magical abilities to explore your surroundings and vanquish supernatural forces. Experience an intense character-driven story, hurling towards an inexorable conclusion.

THE ATTACK FROM BEYOND

Spirits are attacking Chestertown!

Nothing is spared from their wrath. Communication is worthless. Evacuation is impossible.

Today, the insignificant, remote town has been terrorized to a standstill.

Tomorrow, it will be wiped from existence.

And nobody knows why.

But when a mysterious masked wizard arrives and proclaims himself the town's savior, a young local boy named Gershom finds himself investigating the enigma of the hostile spirits alongside the eccentric newcomer. As the shadows of an ancient conspiracy loom across the land, the unlikely duo must journey deep into the history of a region shrouded in tragedy to uncover the truth behind the supernatural assault.

WELCOME TO THE LAND OF AURUM

  • Traverse the massive peninsula encompassing Chestertown and beyond. Explore unique and exotic locales, packed to the brim with secrets and dangers alike.

  • Unlock magical abilities to manipulate the world around you. Using your powers creatively will uncover new areas to explore. Solve puzzles. Conquer your surroundings.

  • Encounter unique characters with their own histories, families, dreams, and desires. Make friends, allies, and enemies. Help others, and they’ll help you in return... usually.

  • Take a break and play some minigames, including Picroglyphs, Fishing, Shrimping, Prize-Pushing, Blackjack, Five-Card Draw, Pachinko, and much more. I may have gone too far in a few places.

THE ONLY LIMIT IS YOU

  • Master every tool in your arsenal to succeed in this one-of-a-kind, stylish action battle system.

  • Featuring unique movesets for every party member, bombastic special moves, chaotic subweapons, hordes of enemies, and more...

  • Robust equipment system lets you load up each character with upgrades and gear to suit your playstyle.

  • Build your perfect party lineup, taking advantage of each character's distinct offensive and support capabilities.

  • Feeling motivated? Alternate gameplay modes and difficulty modifiers allow you to create the ultimate test of your power. Style switching mode? Hard mode? You bet. Be warned, you may find that familiar foes have some new tricks up their sleeves...

VISUALSHOCK! SPEEDSHOCK! SOUNDSHOCK!

  • Illustrated cutscenes, multi-sprite bosses, and dazzling visual effects brought to life through handcrafted, pixel-perfect visuals.

  • Fast-paced expressive combat that fuses all-out platforming action and the tactics of turn-based RPGs.

  • Experience a pulse-pounding soundtrack powered by the legendary YM2612 synthesizer.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes mature content such as violence, blood, partial nudity, suggestive themes, horror and frightening imagery, mild profanity, and simulated gambling.
